answers.answer: I am in the same boat!I am 28wks2days.. last sat. i was suppose measure about 28wks and measured 31 weeks.. and have been measuring big the whole pregnancy..my midwife told me at my appt if i am still measuring big they will schedule an u/s..I was wondering the same thing about the due date??

I am in the same boat as well, but I normally have large babies for my size, all my babies are born over 9 pounds.I am 20w1d and I have been measuring about 2 weeks ahead of schedule. Now if you know your exact LMP(last mentrual period) date then I don't see why she would move your due date. If you are unsure when you concieved then she may move it to accomodate the size that your measuring.My doc and I are unsure about my due date because I was on Depo and hubby had a vesectomy when I got preggers, so the chances of my date moving are pretty good, Now if I knew my exact dates then the due date would be unlikely to change.A due date is just a guesstimation on when baby will arrive, less than 10% of babies are actually born on their actual given due dates.I also do not believe 100% that they can calculate a good birth weight with ultrasound, mainly because my youngest son Aiden was supposed to be 6lbs 7ounces at birth and he came out 9 pounds 6 ounces. When they measure your baby they look at the size of the head, femur, and tummy, but you may be having just a large baby in weight, but a short baby in length like I did.I wish you luck, and I wouldnt ask for induction, I would wait till baby comes on his/her own especially if your unsure of your dates.
usually if there is more than 1-2 weeks difference they will move up your due date.

Well when I got preggers I hadn'e had a period in almost 2 years and had just had a m/c. So I'm not too sure of the dates. I hope they move it up. It just seems like she is so big and so heavy. I go for an u/s on tuesday the 3rd. So lets see what happends. Shoot I gained 10 1/2 lbs in 2 weeks. And I don't know how. I just think she is going to be really big.
bump

Have u been checked for gestational diabetes yet?  I had a big surge in weight over a couple of weeks  Also large babies can indicate that.  And with gestational diabetes they are always concerned about excess amnio fluid

My test for the diabetes was fine. Maybe my due date is wrong. See I had a m/c in nov and found out I was pregnant again in dec. Could it have been that I never miscarried(?) ? And I haven't had a peiod since feb 06 so I dont know when I ovulated. I'm just confused... LOL

I have consistantly measuring 4 weeks ahead since 26 weeks I have my 34 week appointment tommorow so I wonder if they will say anything cuz they really didnt seem to concerned UMMM wonder what that means, I had a U/S at the hospital at 29 weeks and that moved my due date but the U/S at the regular sono place I have been going to leaves it at the same and there is a big diff of July 7th and June 28th but if I go by my last menses I should be July 2nd so talk about really really confused.

Wow that is confusing. I hope they move it up. i remember going to an app when they said I was further along but they never changed my due date, so I guess my Dr's getting concerned because I'm huge and gaining all this weight, she wants to get the baby checked out and see whats going on. I also went in early with my son. Actually had him @ 35wks and he was 6lbs 7oz. So she just might be big! Who knows... LOL

You're measuring really big for your current date. You dont have diabetes so that rules that out but then again as a last resort the doctor might see if he follows your new pattern to 40wks and then might ask to do an amnio to make sure the baby's lungs are developed and check it against the weight of the baby at that time and decide to induce unless you give birth on your own. I might be wrong but it's something you can ask to see if it's a possibility.

I guess thats why they are doing an ultra sound to see where the baby measures. Because the docotr came to her conclusion when she mesured my belly.  hope they dont do an amnio.Thats kind of scary, and I now someone who got it done and had complications afterwards. So lets see what happends!

Hi allIm the same measuring about 2 or so weeks ahead. Im 29wks so that would make me 31wks :-) but...My Ob is leaving me at the same due date though as they say the most accurate you can determine is from the very first ultrasound which for me is still at Aug 14. I wish he'd bring me forward then I might have him on my birthday which would be cool.... lol...I have seemed to have even been ahead/ infront with all of my pregnancy milestones (kicks etc) compared to what is the norm for that time in pregnancy so who knows??I do agree thou how can they completely tell. Even with me we were actively ttc and were ovulation tracking etc with charts and progesterone testing etc and according to my day21 prog blood test I didnt even ovulate nor did my temps show that I O'd - so who knows when I fell preggers?I do know though that from my understanding if baby is bigger than average they will not let you go much past your edd. so if you dont go early or on your edd at least you wont have to wait an extra 2weeks like some ladies do.I like to think of it too that my baby is already 'above average' even before entering the world - now isnt that a great way to start your life!!xx

My mum was measuring a month ahead every pregnancy and had 4 normal sized babies, just alot of water. From 13 weeks onwards babies grow at their own rate. At 16 weeks i was measuring 18.5 weeks, at 22 weeks i was dead on 22 weeks and at 25weeks 4 days i was measuring 26 weeks 6 days.I have been told my EDD is 25/08/2008 but i was on the pill and didnt have any dates to go by (i dont get periods on the pill) so have no idea when im due. I think it might be a little bit earlier but we'l have to just wait and see.Midwife says that they always tend to keep the dates from your first scan as these have been proven to be the most accurate
im 29 weeks my baby measures 31 weeks..i think there is room for error wit the tape measure

Lets see what happends. I'll know something on tuesday when they do my ultra sound. They said they will do a level 2 ultra sound even though I don't know what the diffrence in levels are. So lets see. I delivered early with my son so I'm glad they are giving me this ultra sound. I also have felt that this baby has been ahead of herself becuase I felt her kick at "11" weeks. But I guess it's a waiting game until tuesday!

I asked the doc the same thing a while ago and he said if it's more than a 2 week difference (less or more) that usually they do change your due date. I've always measured exactly, so they stuck to my due date which is real soon, June 13th!!

I hope they do because whe the dr measured it was like a 4-5 week diffrence. Congrats to you miko_latte your almost there. I bet your happy. RIght now my edd is 8/15/08 im hoping it changes for me. I can't wait to hold little Latanya in my arms!!!  :)

Thank you! It'll be real soon since you can hold your baby girl. At like 7 months, my pregnancy was going sooo slow for me because I was just so anxious!! And now I look back and everything went so fast!! Yea, a 4-5 week difference they should change your due date, that's a whole month difference. Well good luck and keep us updated!! Best wishes.
Yeah I am getting impatient... LOL... I'll let everyone know how my ultra sound turns out tuesday!!!!

I'm 22w1d and I'm measuring to about 26 weeks.The doc says that he might move my due date up, but he doesn't want to just yet because he wants to see how the baby continues to grow and we'll talk about a possible EDD around my 26th-27th week... depending on if the baby continues to grow rapidly.He told me that because of my hip build, and my mother's history of carrying big babies... he wouldn't be surprised if I ended up with a 8-10lb baby.All my siblings were over 9lbs sept for my sister Autumn who was about 8lbs but she was over a month premature.I was 9lbs 2 oz.My sister Darcee was almost 9 lbs.My brother Timothy was almost 12 lbs!!! But I think she had diabetes with his pregnancy but her stupid doctors never tested her for it.My sister Autumn was almost 8lbs.And my brother Damien was over 10lbs.So that just shows what I'M in for!!lololGreat.

question: SO I went to the docotrs today and I'm supposed to be 28w5d but the doctor told me that I am measuring between 33 and 34 weeks. She schedualed me an ulta sound. DO you think they will move my due date up? Or induce me early. I hope she's just not thins huge little baby... LOL What do you ladies think?
title: I'm 28wks5d and mesuring diffrently
